description: [NGLite](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1106) has abused NKN infrastructure for its C2 communication.(Citation: NGLite Trojan)

external_references.description: Robert Falcone, Jeff White, and Peter Renals. (2021, November 7). Targeted Attack Campaign Against ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus Delivers Godzilla Webshells, NGLite Trojan and KdcSponge Stealer. Retrieved February 8, 2024.
